mapper.sql: menu_id, `name`, permission, `path`, pid, `level`, `state`, remark, memo, version, is_enabled, is_deleted, creator_id, updater_id, creator_name, updater_name, created_time, updated_time
mapper.select: select rm.menu_id from sys_role_menu rm where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and rm.menu_id not in (select m.pid from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu srm on m.menu_id = srm.menu_id and srm.role_id = #{roleId})
